official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a segment of the Delaware River in Pennsylvania and New Jersey for potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a segment of the Delaware River in Pennsylvania and New Jersey for potential addition to the national wild and scenic rivers system.
